Subject: DoListObject control
Description:
Hello
We have a problem with the "DoListObject" control. At this time it's a informative rule but we are blocked at oradad level 2 even if the global domain risk level is 0.
The "DoListObject" parameter is set because we have implemeted red forest model with masking administration OU.
Best regards
DevOps_Steps_to_Reproduce__c: Custom maturity level was not set hence the issue
What_We_Know__c: The customer is experiencing an issue with the "DoListObject" control. Although it is an informative rule, they are blocked at oradad level 2, even when the global domain risk level is 0. This issue arises because the "DoListObject" parameter is set due to the implementation of the red forest model with masking administration OU.
Next_Steps__c:
Provided customer with the fix.

Use the custom rules (Configuration -> Custom Rules) to change the maturity level
Solution_Comment__c: Use the custom rules (Configuration -> Custom Rules) to change the maturity level
